Its capital is Madingou. Bouenza is divided into two communes and ten districts: *Commune # Nkayi Commune # Madingou *Districts # Boko-Songho District # Kayes District # Kingou√© District # Loudima District # Madingou District # Mabombo District # Mfouati District # Mouyondzi District # Tsiaki District # Yamba District ==References== Category:Departments of the Republic of the Congo
